# [Interview #1121: Brandon Sanderson Book Signing at JordanCon 8, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1121#12)

#### Question

Is Dalinar forgetting his wife the curse or…?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That’s a RAFO. You know that was coming.
